narrative:
First prelicense inspection.
No noncompliant items identified at this inspection.
Applicant and facility meet all requirements to obtain an 'A' license.
Discussed identification.
Record-keeping requirements were explained to the applicant.
License fee received and is attached to inspection report.
Applicant will be sending license fee to the office.  Address given to applicant:
USDA APHIS AC
920 Main Campus Drive
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
No regulated activities may be conducted by the applicant until a USDA license is issued.
Inspection and exit interview conducted with Applicant.
Additional Inspectors
Mchenry Kerry, Veterinary Medical Officer

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
